poem:
"In Pursuit of Graspable Peace"

A blitz of sharp voices,  
webbed in apathy, assail  
the noble chalk-scribblers—  
protectors of mind's sanctuary.  

A unit proposed,  
to slay the beast  
of conflict and constricting freedom.  

Once forced, the teacher,  
now gathers strength  
in this proposal's silent promise—  
A seed of hope,  
sprouting amidst the wind-torn fields of  
Yorkshire.
